title.title: BALI RAFTING AND ELEPHANT RIDE TOUR
title.text: BALI RAFTING AND ELEPHANT RIDE TOUR
title.html: BALI RAFTING AND ELEPHANT RIDE TOUR

tagline.title: BALI RAFTING AND ELEPHANT RIDE TOUR PACKAGES IS DOUBLE JOYMENT FOR TRY THE AMAZING WHITE WATER RAFTING AT AYUNG RIVER AND CONTINUE RIDING AN ELEPHANT IN BALI ISLANDS
tagline.text: BALI RAFTING AND ELEPHANT RIDE TOUR PACKAGES IS DOUBLE JOYMENT FOR TRY THE AMAZING WHITE WATER RAFTING AT AYUNG RIVER AND CONTINUE RIDING AN ELEPHANT IN BALI ISLANDS
tagline.html: BALI RAFTING AND ELEPHANT RIDE TOUR PACKAGES IS DOUBLE JOYMENT FOR TRY THE AMAZING WHITE WATER RAFTING AT AYUNG RIVER AND CONTINUE RIDING AN ELEPHANT IN BALI ISLANDS

description.text: Bali Rafting and Elephant Ride Tour is an Bali Double Activities Tour Packages we offer to you by allowed you to enjoy the rafting adventure at Ayung River and then continue to do the Elephant Ride for 30 minutes ride at Bakas Elephant Parks. The Adventure start upon our friendly Bali Driver pick up you at hotel, then start to go to the Rafting provider, on the way to the rafting you will see amazing scenery from the private and comportable car. First you will have short briefing for safety information and then the rafting guide will lead you to enjoy the 2 hours adventure at Ayung river with rapids challenge class 2 and 3 which is very safe for beginner and after finish rafting you will enjoy the deliccious lunch buffet indonesian food and then after finish lunch, our Bali Tour Driver will assisted to the Bakas Elephant Parks to enjoy the experience riding an Elephant for 30 minutes ride through the bush, jungle and passed local village with amazing view from the top of the elephants. This Bali Rafting and Elephant Ride Tour Packages is more enjoyable with our Amazing Bali Driver which always perform the excellent Tour Services for make your day is Fantastic.

title.title: Bali Ayung River Rafting Tour | Bali Rafting and Elephant Ride Tour Packages

image.title: Bali Ayung River Rafting Tour | Bali Rafting and Elephant Ride Tour Packages | Bali Golden Tour

description.text: Bali Ayung River Rafting Tour is one of white water rafting adventure tour packages we have to enjoy the great challenge of rapids adventure at Ayung River in northern of Ubud village. This river offer amazing experience for your journey to explore the river with amazing panorama view. This river is very suitable for beginner who never try the rafting before but want to try the challenge. During the rafting you will stop at the small waterfall at the river and allowed you to swim at the river. Is an rare experience you will have and the professional rafting guide will always give his maksimun services to make you more enjoyable.
description.html: Bali Ayung River Rafting Tour is one of white water rafting adventure tour packages we have to enjoy the great challenge of rapids adventure at Ayung River in northern of Ubud village. title.title: Bali Elephant Ride Tour | Bali Rafting and Elephant Ride Tour Packages

image.title: Bali Elephant Ride Tour | Bali Rafting and Elephant Ride Tour Packages | Bali Golden Tour

description.text: Bali Elephant Ride Tour is some great adventure to riding an Elephant in Bali islands, This journey will give amazing experience to sit on teak chair on the top of the elphant and see the beautiful panoraman view surrounds the parks. The elphant parks we will visit is the Bakas Elephant Park in Klungkung regency, in here you will riding an elephant or 30 minutes ride and will assist by professional Elephant Tour Guide. You will go along green bushes and side of river. During the Elephant Trip you will also see beautiful green hill and sometimes appearance of monkey's.

price.title: Bali Rafting and Elephant Ride Tour Price :
price.content:
Bali Rafting and Elephant Ride Tour Price :

  • 1 Person : IDR 1,450,000 (Solo Traveler)
  • 2 Person : IDR 1,150,000/person
  • 3 Person : IDR 1,100,000/person
  • 4 Person : IDR 975,000/person
  • 5 Person or More : IDR 950,000/person

Note :

  • Get Special price for group booking

Bali Rafting and Elephant Ride Tour Price Included :

  • Private Car with Clean, Comfortable and Good A/C condition
  • Mineral Water
  • Safety and Well Maintenance Equipment's
  • Rafting at Ayung River
  • 30 Minutes Elephant Ride
  • Professional Rafting and Elephant Ride Guide
  • Lunch buffet Indonesian Food
  • Insurance Coverage

itinerary.title: Bali Rafting and Elephant Ride Tour Itinerary :

content.event: Enjoy Rafting Adventure at Ayung River
Lunch finish and continue the tour
Enjoy Elephant Ride Tour for 30 Minutes Ride
Elephant Ride Tour finish and Back to hotel

inclusion:
Seminyak, Legian, Kuta, Nusa Dua, Jimbaran, Pecatu, Sanur, Ubud, Canggu, Denpasar, Benoa Harbour, Airport
Please contact us for pick up in different area

• Payment is Cash Payment
  • Payment is on the day itself with our driver
  • Payment with other currency will convert based on daily exchange rate

• The price already include with 21% Government tax and Services
  • Get special price for group booking
  • The tour is Private Tours, means there is no other participant, just only you and your companion
  • The Tour will assist by English Speaking Tours Driver
  • Tour Guide can be requested, contact us if you want to request Tour Guide during the trip
  • Time and Tourism site is subject to change based on your request.
  • Use contact form provide to send us message, asking information or make tour booking request.
